Percolate, http://percolate.com/ New York, NY.

Looking for Python Engineers, Data Engineers, and DevOps. http://percolate.com/about/jobs/

Our mission is to figure out what's happening on the Internet in real time, and to present it to our users. We use whatever makes sense, we automate everything, and we allocate the time to build quality software.
